Majority filter

Source: R/image_analysis_filters.R
wbt_majority_filter.Rd

Assigns each cell in the output grid the most frequently occurring value (mode) in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_majority_filter(
  input,
  output,
  filterx = 11,
  filtery = 11,
  wd = NULL,
  verbose_mode = FALSE,
  compress_rasters = FALSE,
  command_only = FALSE
)

Arguments

input

Input raster file.

output

Output raster file.

filterx

Size of the filter kernel in the x-direction.

filtery

Size of the filter kernel in the y-direction.

wd

Changes the working directory.

verbose_mode

Sets verbose mode. If verbose mode is FALSE, tools will not print output messages.

compress_rasters

Sets the flag used by 'WhiteboxTools' to determine whether to use compression for output rasters.

command_only

Return command that would be executed by system() rather than running tool.

Value

Returns the tool text outputs.

Contents
